thread.title: Trip to London
thread.title_full: Trip to London - Review of The Grosvenor Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Naser O
title: Trip to London
text: It's my first business trip to London and the warm reception of the staff at hotel is very impressive. They are very helpful, kind and pleasant people especially Meliha at receipting who was of a great support during my stay. Eirini was also of great help and too pleasant person to deal with. Many thanks for all staff members at Grosvenor.
